example.eg: The two vases are identical.  The two brothers were wearing identical outfits.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 一模一样的, 完全相同的

example.eg: I tried to get into a car that was identical to mine.
I used to date an identical twin; sometimes I wasn't sure whether I was with him or his brother!  Angie and Rachel are identical twins, but people who know them well can usually tell them apart.
example.egtrans: 我曾经和一位同胞兄弟约会过。有时，我都不确定我是和他还是和他兄弟在一起！

trans_examp.trans_cn: 同卵双胞胎中的一个, 同胞姐妹, 同胞兄弟
不完全一样的, 不相同的
